library(data.table)

# Load the dataset using data.table
mtcars_dt <- fread("mtcars.csv")

# Identify numeric columns (excluding the first 'CarModel' column)
numeric_cols <- names(mtcars_dt)[-1]  # فرض بر اینکه ستون اول غیرعددی است

# Ensure numeric_cols are indeed numeric
mtcars_dt[, (numeric_cols) := lapply(.SD, as.numeric), .SDcols = numeric_cols]

# Store numeric data separately (اختیاری)
numeric_data <- mtcars_dt[, ..numeric_cols]

# Print preview of the dataset
print(head(mtcars_dt))
cat("Dimensions:", dim(mtcars_dt), "\n")
cat("Column Names:", paste(names(mtcars_dt), collapse = ","), "\n")
cat("Numeric Columns for Analysis:", paste(numeric_cols, collapse = ","), "\n")
